children.text: protkaṇṭhayanti na mano bhuvi kasya yūnaḥ
pradiśatu himayuktaḥ kāla eṣaḥ sukhaṃ vaḥ
kalpāntaṃ madanapriyo diśatu vaḥ puṣpāgamo maṅgalam
jyā yasyālikulaṃ kalaṅkarahitaṃ chattraṃ sitāṃśuḥ sitam
